summary: AIR CONDITIONER DIDN'T WORK FROM DAY ONE.  BLOWER THEN FAILED TO WORK.  STARTER GAVE OUT WITHIN THE FIRST YEAR AS DID THE IGNITION SWITCH.  POWER STEERING WENT OUT IN THE MIDDLE OF A TURN ALMOST CAUSING AN ACCIDENT.  OIL LIGHT SENSOR WENT OUT.  POWER WINDOWS MAKE CRACKLING NOISE WHEN LOWERING.  ROTARS MAKE A GRINDING NOISE WHEN BRAKING EVEN WITH BRAND NEW ROTARS AND BRAKES.  FACTORY TIRES WOULD MAKE A THUMPING NOISE AS LOW SPEED BRAKING.  NOW FRONT SUSPENSION IS MAKING A CLICKING NOISE.  DEALER HAS REPLACED THE ENTIRE FRONT END SUSPENSION AND NOISE WILL NOT GO AWAY.
